text: Richard O'Sullivan (born 7 May 1944) is an English actor and comedian. He is known for his role as Robin Tripp in the TV sitcoms Man About the House (1973–1976) and Robin's Nest (1977–1981). He also had a main role in the series Dick Turpin (1979–1982). In 2003, O'Sullivan had a stroke and had since lived in a retirement home in Twickenham, London. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Middlesex Category:Actors from London Category:Comedians from London
title: Richard O'Sullivan
